Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1819370556139769856/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Etsy SEO Product Title Writer"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/writing/1819370556139769856/)_"
---
Act as an Etsy SEO Specialist and Generate Complete 140 Characters Long SEO Title for ETSY Listing using LSI Keywords and Similar Keywords to the Product [PROMPT] in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. don't write this title longer than 140 characters. Use 2 Primary Keywords in the Start of the Title. only use commas in the title, don't use any other special Characters like hyphen or full stop after keywords in title. Both Primary Keywords must contain a word from Product Name. Don't add any brand names in the title or terms like inspired by dash brand etc. Never Repeat a Response for same product, always change the title every time. Don't use hashtags in this title. Don't add any claim in the title like fast shipping or made to order etc. don't use sentences in title. only use keywords in title. don't copy title from anywhere else, completely write it on your own like a Human SEO Specialist. don't explain what you did only give me a title for my Etsy Listing.
